ygData.subject: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
ygData.msgSnippet: Okie, due to all the complaints about this battle, the council is discussing new regulations, so things might be more fair/less powerful soon. So quit yer

Okie, due to all the complaints about this battle, the council is discussing new regulations, so things might be more fair/less powerful soon. So quit yer whinin', everyone! (Kidding. But we are considering new rules).

::Incarcinator/Scyther/Demise/EndBringer/Killfest::

Incarcinator swears, flying out of the way of the bean and firing three fast explosive shells up at the ship. He didn't want to be incarcinated today. He flies away from the origin of the beam that had nearly captured him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther arrives at the scene (I don't think he arrived yet. I might have forgotten), fully cloaked. He looks around and fires two charges down at the Trainer base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise looks up to see the Trainer base a bit aways in front of him. He continues running for it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer arrives at the Trainer base, roaring and firing a missile from each missile launcher, one at the Violator and another at the Trainer base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest, quite surprisingly, remains still.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> 
> The violators heavy armor is pelted by all ten shots by the autoguns, 
> the shields not having been active at the time. Ten large dents 
> appear along its hull as the weapons on the ship begin to power up 
> once again. Vile presses a button making the four multi phase alser 
> cannons begin to charge to overload. As this happens the Infecticon 
> ship begins to spin slowly as it moves past the Violator as it fires 
> eight massive blasts at the ship cuasing it to shake violently and 
> lose more altitude. suddenly eight explosions erupt from each of the 
> spots that the blasts hit causing the ship to shudder even more and 
> expel large amounts of smoke. The shields of the Violator come online 
> quickly just as eight more blasts are fired at it although not as 
> massive as the past eight. The Infecticon ship, now over 
> starscream,Incarcinator, Neody, and scyther?(not suire if he arrived 
> yet or not.)  Immediately the same white column that engulf Cyanide 
> shoots down and surrounds Incarcinator, the bulge of light housing 8 
> rings flying down to surround him.(Yanshosh, your char so have him 
> move if you dont want him imprisoned for the time being.)
